extendedInfo.description: 33% off The Price until the end of the month on full version!Update 0.12 is here!. With great performance fix for lower Androids + small graphic update.as our loyal user asked, here comes simple menu+ more cars for demo +1 car and full version +4 cars and more in the future.Finally Update 0.010 Is Live! :)Update 0.010, fixed the sudden drift when you go to highspeed, also the map has been increased again! now with 2 new towns. check out the map image to see it in full scale. remember to tell us what do you think. are we going to an better direction or should we just back down into older versions!:)Ever Wanted To Just Freeroam/race with some of most basic cars while waiting for something!?well wait no more ExO Drive Gives full freeroam ability + Career mod And race's at future updates!With your support for our 1 Man Team you will help me build & make the game smoother and betterPlease Lets me know every bug and issue you find, ill be sure to try to fix them!please note.

reviews.title: Huge Bug
reviews.comment: Huge bug only coop really works r34 does badly but all rest glitch out also if  you crash into anything the whole scenery starts flashing purple and if you go faster it gets brighter to white. just wanted to improve what could be a great game and I want to help the dev this isn\'t a complaint all problems on Sony Xperia Tipo running android 4.0.1 I know it says dual core or high end single but it is normally v.quick  Help.with this issue plz
reviews.author: Nick Long

reviews.title: Apps
reviews.comment: I don\'t know anything about this game! But if you need support to make this game better, then I\'m all for it.
reviews.author: Jamie Sepeda

reviews.title: Please fix!!!??
reviews.comment: Most of the cars have grafic errors and are annoying PLEASE FIX ASAP MY PHONE IS SAMSUNG GALAXY NEXUS
reviews.author: Anthony Ticconi

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: This dose not install on my phone please do something.or refund me :(
reviews.author: Raunak Shaikh

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Cool but want more cars around you please fix I\'m 8 years old Also if the monster truck cant go or any cars put a reset where it last touched the ground with its wheels  please  read creators thank you  Alex popa  :)
reviews.author: Vincent Popa MD

reviews.title: Ok bt nt great
reviews.comment: Needs touch screen steering make this update and ill giv more stars

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: The game lags too much and needs more cars
reviews.author: Chris Reese

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: This game does not load on my phone, it loads and blacks out, refund me please :(

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Please make update for not power phones: HTC EVO 3d and another . And bug fix please with touch screen and lugs and plus options bottom .
